line.comment: * MordanB - default outposts to normal quality level for ship building.
* ZH 2.0 - default worker settings, can copy from existing outpost
* First station tutorial message and bonus.
* See comments in !move.DropStationAt.xml to see why we wrap this in a global.. to prevent the message from being sent twice under a rare condition.
* Add-Ons 1.3: No tutorial message on insane.
* write to log file 1 append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='$craftingWares = %s', $craftingWares, null, null, null, null
* Herobetty 5.3: Set non-homebased player ships to this outpost.
* Forbid every other faction to dock.
* Add-Ons 1.1: base max spec now takes terraforming into account for AIs.
* Mordan2 - set all new outpost color to white.
* Mordan7 - change default trade jumps for new outposts.

sval.val: MordanB - default outposts to normal quality level for ship building.
ZH 2.0 - default worker settings, can copy from existing outpost
First station tutorial message and bonus.
See comments in !move.DropStationAt.xml to see why we wrap this in a global.. to prevent the message from being sent twice under a rare condition.
Add-Ons 1.3: No tutorial message on insane.
write to log file 1 append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='$craftingWares = %s', $craftingWares, null, null, null, null
Herobetty 5.3: Set non-homebased player ships to this outpost.
Forbid every other faction to dock.
Add-Ons 1.1: base max spec now takes terraforming into account for AIs.
Mordan2 - set all new outpost color to white.
Mordan7 - change default trade jumps for new outposts.
